metadata.Title: CVE-2019-12384 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: FasterXML jackson-databind 2.x before 2.9.9.1 might allow attackers to havea variety of impacts by leveraging failure to block the logback-core classfrom polymorphic deserialization. Depending on the classpath content,remote code execution may be possible.

criterions.comment: jackson-databind: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
